name: DataMatrixCode
summary: Simple Data Matrix helpers with fluent and static APIs.

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent Data Matrix builder for text payloads.
members.signature: static DataMatrixCode.DataMatrixBuilder Create(string text, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode, MatrixOptions options)

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent Data Matrix builder for byte payloads.
members.signature: static DataMatrixCode.DataMatrixBuilder Create(byte[] data, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode, MatrixOptions options)

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a text payload as Data Matrix.
members.signature: static BitMatrix Encode(string text, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode)

members.name: EncodeBytes
members.summary: Encodes a byte payload as Data Matrix.
members.signature: static BitMatrix EncodeBytes(byte[] data, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode)

members.name: EncodeBytes
members.summary: Encodes a byte payload as Data Matrix.
members.signature: static BitMatrix EncodeBytes(ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode)

members.name: Png

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves Data Matrix to a file for byte payloads based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, string path, DataMatrixEncodingMode mode, MatrixOptions options, string title)

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves Data Matrix to a file based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
